formattedAddress: 601 W 163rd St, New York, NY 10032, USA
adrFormatAddress: 601 W 163rd St, New York, NY 10032, USA

originalText.text: Wow! What an exceptional experience. Ive been searching for a dermatology office with experienced professional staff where I could trust the physicians with something as important as my skin. The staff was inviting and greeted me promptly with nothing but smiles and kindness. The medical staff was extremely professional and knowledgeable, answering all my concerns and made me feel at ease. They made everything extremely comforting and easy. Highly recommended.

text.text: Wow! What an exceptional experience. Ive been searching for a dermatology office with experienced professional staff where I could trust the physicians with something as important as my skin. The staff was inviting and greeted me promptly with nothing but smiles and kindness. The medical staff was extremely professional and knowledgeable, answering all my concerns and made me feel at ease. They made everything extremely comforting and easy. Highly recommended.

originalText.text:
What an outstanding office and staff. The care I have received here has been excellent. Wait times were not long and staff was friendly. The doctor and his team were professional, knowledgeable and caring. On several occasions, I have came in and seen both the NP & PA on staff and both have listened to my concerns & answered any questions I had. I did not feel rushed during my appointment which is a big deal and what I look for in a dermatology office.

Thank you to the staff at skin first dermatology for taking good care of me.

originalText.text: I recently visited Skin First Dermatology for a persistent itch, and I couldn’t be happier with the care I received. They accurately diagnosed my condition and provided excellent recommendations. The staff was friendly, the office was inviting, and the personalized attention was outstanding. Highly recommended!

text.text: I recently visited Skin First Dermatology for a persistent itch, and I couldn’t be happier with the care I received. They accurately diagnosed my condition and provided excellent recommendations. The staff was friendly, the office was inviting, and the personalized attention was outstanding. Highly recommended!

originalText.text: Going to the place was a blessing. Originally came here for a wart removal but I had to come back for something my primary doctor misdiagnosed. The staff there was able to help me efficiently and quickly. My favorite part about this office is their honesty. They aren’t just trying to send you medicine and discharge you. They are blunt! Love this spot

The staff there was able to help me efficiently and quickly. My favorite part about this office is their honesty. They aren’t just trying to send you medicine and discharge you. They are blunt! Love this spot

originalText.text: I cannot say enough good things about this establishment; there are soooooo many medspas around today especially in NYC and half of them have no clue what they are doing. do yourself a favor, go to a pro. Artem was my injector and he was super knowledgeable. It makes me feel better knowing he actually studied dermatology AND has acute care experience. He is gentle, it was painless and the place is clean. great experience truly cant say enough good things; he is the only person coming near my face with a needle. 10 stars **********
